articles.author: Emilia David
articles.title: Lawyers say OpenAI could be in real trouble with Scarlett Johansson - The Verge
articles.description: OpenAI might find itself in legal trouble if Scarlett Johansson decides to use California’s right to publicity rules to protect her voice and identity against ChatGPT.
articles.content:
